TopicTitle: Game makes my screendrivers crash with mods

Articles.Content:
So i use 32 with

Deadly Reentry

Kerbal Engineer Redux 0.6

FAR

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

Kethane

NASAmission (asteroid redirect)

All the mods included in KSP interstellar modpack

RealChute

RemoteTech

And my screen drivers crash everytime i'm in the research building clicking to research something or in the Contract building trying to take contracts. I'm using the lates Nvidia drivers and i have the GTX660.

So could someone tell what's wrong?

Thanks in advance

StarfishLeader

The DMP file i have no acces to
Welcome to the forums! The How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky will tell you what other information will help narrow down your problem, particularly a complete output log and dxdiag.
Update: issue was apparently caused by KSP interstellar using an obsolite mod so removing it fixed the problems
